author: remm
msg: - Fix some basic issues with the AJP on APR implementation.
- In particular, endRequest is no longer called twice (oops ...).

author: jfclere
msg: test retcode of recv() to prevent the example for looping.
BTW: When testing with openssl 'Q' closes the socket in openssl ' Q' could
be used to get the closing in SSLServer.

author: mturk
msg: Use stack buffer for small (< 8K) byte arrays.

author: mturk
msg: Update sslinfo to use the indexed approach to the params instead
a name based. This way we'll keep the lower number of native functions.

author: jfclere
msg: Use -o $@ overwise make in apache-2.0 will fail with libtool 1.5.2
